请输入资源组名称: Please enter the resource group name: e.g. Pass, Tiilg, etc.
请输入资源组描述: Please enter a resource group description
创建资源组说明: Can request, calculate and access resources
您即将创建一个资源组: You are about to create a resource group
资源组可以包含多个离线计算资源_多个实时计算资源等: A resource group can contain multiple offline computing resources,multiple real-time computing resources, etc.
管理员可以申请计算资源_包括CPU内存等多种设备型号: Administrators can apply for computing resources, including various device models such as CPU and memory.
申请存储资源_会链接到外部的各个存储系统进行申请: Administrators can request multiple storage type resources.
资源组管理员可以申请计算接入资源_资源单位再商讨: Administrators can request resources for services such as cleaning in data integration.
请先选择业务和资源组类型: Please select the business and resource group type first
申请使用资源组资源需要资源组管理人审批: The application of resource group resources requires the approval of the resource group manager
私有_只有授权的应用才能该资源组资源: Private: Only authorized applications can access this resource group resource.
公开_无需授权就可以使用该资源组资源: Public: Only open to data platform administrators.
公共资源组无需授权: Public resource groups do not require authorization
公开资源组无需授权: Open resource groups do not require authorization
申请的总容量: Applied total capacity = unit model * quantity
请输入项目名称进行搜索: Please enter the project name to search
